tr.td: [Bug 2717] Unterminated INCLUDE section causes infinite loop with setExitOnFirstFatalError(false)
Fix: ReaderMgr Should check if XMLReader is created successfully.
Fix: default attribute are not added when namespace is on and validation is off.
Fix: SAX AttributeList::getName should attach prefix if present
[Bug 6672] SAXValidator results in an access violation when validating against schema with empty element that has default value.
Fix: Create ZeroOrOne node for PCDATA only if needed.
Schema Fix: Thread-safe the built-in datatype validator registry.
Merge IThreadTest and ThreadTest. Modify ThreadTest to do schema processing, and add ThreadTest to sanityTest.pl
[Bug 2845] HP-UX 10.20 with CC A.10.40 needs +Z instead of +z.
Fix: Add code for ContentSpecNode::All in formatNode.
Add support for building with new MacOSURLAccessCF NetAccessor that doesn't require Carbon but can allow Xerces to live soley within CoreServices layer.
[Bug 6092] stricmp and strnicmp not present in FreeBSD.
Update Mac OS projects to reflect "sane includes" changes.
Base64 interface redefined for conversion in XMLByte.
Add constraint checking for the extension of an 'all' content model.
[Bug 4581] erroneous static cast in programming examples.
Update samples to use SAX2 features/properties constants from XMLUni.
[Bug 2496] libxerces-c1_5_0 fails to build correctly on Solaris.
Added a new flag '-p' to SAX2 samples to set the 'namespace-prefixes' feature.
Remove 3rd party jar style-apachexmljar, expand into physical files.
Modify InitTermTest to take option flag like -s, -f , and -n.
[Bug 5716] Can't parse with Validation more than one file.
Recognize IBM01140 (IANA encoding) as alias of intrinsic encoding IBM1140.
Add DOM Level2 missing functions: NodeIterator::getRoot, TreeWalker::getRoot Element::hasAttribute, Element::hasAttributeNS and Node::hasAttribute
Memory leak fix in samples / test cases.
src and include folder reorganization for "sane_include".
Fix: some SAX calls were not passed to the LexicalHandler.
Remove those jar files that are not clear in license issue.
Add a 'null' string constant in XMLUni.
The namespace-prefixes feature in SAX2 should be off by default.
Progressive parse does not do post-validation and thus ID/IDREF are not checked.
Update DOM/IDOM hasFeature method to correctly reflect current status. And add more hasFeature test to DOMMemTest.
Some intrinsic encodings support (e.g. UTF-16) only work as input encoding while reading in XML data; but do not work as output encoding in XMLformatter.
Document encoding alias for intrinsic encoding support.
[Bug 5847] ICUMsgLoader can't be compiled with gcc 3.0.3 and ICU2. And also fix the memory leak introduced by Bug 2730 fix.

Adds the capability to compile the tests under FreeBSD and either ICU or IconvFBSD transservice (the transcoding service is automatically detected during configuration stage), with or without pthreads.
[Bug 5371] runConfigure extra linker options ignored in Makefiles for tests and samples.
Break program.xml which takes too long to load, into program-sax.xml, program-sax2.xml program-dom.xml, program-idom.xml.
Break faq-parse.xml which becomes longer and longer into faq-parse.xml and faq-build.xml to better categorize the FAQ, and update the FAQ
Create symbolic link to those duplicate ICU libraries, instead of physical duplicate copies.
[Bug 5807] Parser produces unexpected errors from 'Good' document.
XMLURi bug fix: related to Authority and wellformedAddress
Support IconvFBSD in multi-threading environment with all the possible combinations of threading and transcoding options.
Fix for identity constraints - union operation.
Resolve namespace first before resolving the schema location in <import>.
[Bug 5675] Use of setExternalSchemaLocation() yields inconsistent behavior.
Fix for validity constraint check for standalone documents.
Fix for regular expression patterns that begin with ".".
Fix for error message when checking for attributes with a namespace prefix.
[Bug 5569] <extension> does not work -- ancestor elements not recognized.
Schema Fix: should not store a temp value as the key in the element pool and the attribute pool.
[Bug 5466] Memory Leak: ElementImpl.cpp's ElementImpl::ElementImpl copy constructor does not cleanup attributes before assignment.
[Bug 5464] Memory Leak: DocumentImpl::importNode does not delete old attribute if its reference count equals zero.
Schema fix: leading whitespace should be preserved for CData type.
Add surrogate support to comments and processing instructions.
Performance: Do not transcode twice in DOMString constructor.
update BUILDINSTRUCTIONS.TXT to be in sync with build instruction in build*.xml.
iSeries (AS/400) documentation update and other iSeries related fixes.
[Bug 5367] Progressive parse does not throw error when file is empty.
Performance: Remove obsolete code in ElemStack.

More changes to IconvFBSDTransService. Allow using "old" TransServece implementation (via '-t native' option to runConfigure) or to employ libiconv (it is a part of FreeBSD ports-collection) services.
[Bug 5320] 1.5.2 Build fails on IRIX. The variable "atomicOpsMutex" has been defined twice.
Swap checking to avoid "dangling pointer" reported by BoundsChecker.

Schema: Add Identity Constraint(Key, KeyRef, Unique, Selector, Field, and Partial XPath Support).
Add XPathSymbols,
XPathMatcherStack,
XPathMatcher,
XPathException,
XercesXPath,
ValueStoreCache,
ValueStore,
IdentityConstraint,
IC_Unique,
IC_Selector,
IC_KeyRef,
IC_Key,
IC_Field,
FieldValueMap,
FieldActivator.
Support Particle Derivation Constraint Checking.

DatatypeValidator:
Support DateTimeValidator,
DateTimeDatatypeValidator,
DateDatatypeValidator,
TimeDatatypeValidator,
DayDatatypeValidator,
MonthDatatypeValidator,
MonthDayDatatypeValidator,
YearDatatypeValidator,
YearMonthDatatypeValidator,
DurationDatatypeValidator.
Add SchemaDataTimeException,
XMLAbstractDoubleFloat,
XMLDateTime.
[Bug 1959] setNodeValue throws exception when spec specifies NOP.
Performance Enhancement. Added setNPrefix and setNLocalPart methods in QName that allow code to take advantage of the fact that it knows the length of the prefix and local name, when possible.
Performance Enhancement. Added a second ContentSpecNode constructor that allows the QName to be just assigned, not copied.
Performance Enhancement. Added a second CMLeaf constructor that indicated the QName passed in was to be adopted.
Performance Enhancement. Modify the handling of the fNEL option so that it results in fgCharCharsTable being modified, instead of having all of the low-level routines check the option.
Make the runConfigure and associated config*, Makefile* in folders tests, samples and src more consistent.
Fix runConfigure which can run into infinite loop with invalid argument
Generate linker map for certain platforms
[Bug 5237] PATH_MAX undefined during build without threading support.
DOMMemTest: delete compiler generated temperary DOMString object "Hello Goodbye".
Do not increment the error count if it is a warning.
[Bug 4544] DOM_NodeList::getLength incorrect when called twice for empty list.
[Bug 2238]libWWW problems with broken proxys and range requests.
[Bug 3683] Access Violations when performing custom schema validation.
Check tohash pointer before accessing content in XMLString::hash.
Fix packageBinaries.pl to correctly strip the zip file name from the target directory which has "." dot in it.
Eliminate Warning from Solaris Forte C++: Warning (Anachronism): Formal argument start_routine of type extern "C".
Eliminate Warning from Solaris Forte C++: Warning: String literal converted to char* in initialization.
[Bug 4655] config.status be included in all future binary releases.
Eliminate Visual C++ compiler warning C4273.
Schema: Allow "0.0" to be a valid lexcial representation of ZERO.
Peter A. Volchek and PeiYong Zhang

New method InputSource::get/setIssueFatalErrorIfNotFound to tell the parser whether to issue fatal error or not if cannot find it (the InputSource). This is required for schema processing as it shouldn't be a fatal error if the schema is not found.

Allow schemaLocation and noNamespaceSchemaLocation to be specified outside the instance document. New methods setExternalSchemaLocation and setExternalNoNamespaceSchemaLocation are added (for SAX2, two new properties are added).
XMLFloat and XMLDouble boundary Values updated.
Add test case InitTermTest to test XMLPlatformUtils:Initialize/Terminate() pair.
Design change: GeneralAttributeCheck is not longer a singleton class.
Move root element check from XMLValidator to XMLScanner and deprecate XMLValidator::checkRootElement().
Update documentation for SAX2XMLReader, DefaultHandler and DOMParser.
Regular Expression: Update the Block Names and Block Range to comply to the latest standard.
DOMIDTest/MemParse fix: Pulled the hardcoded encoding out of the document itself and made it a #define to make it easier to support other encodings.
DOMMemTest fix: Changed some literal values to their equivalent hex values so they work correctly on both ASCII and EBCDIC systems.
Bug Fix: maxChars in XMLString::copyNString is more related to the target than the src.
Performance: Create QName in ContentSpecNode only if it is a leaf/Any/PCDataNode.
Performance: move getRawName() to outer loop in DFAContentModel so that it is called only once per outer loop.
IDOM: Leak: should allocate the fNodeListPool with the overloaded new.
Update samples doc to reflect the latest changes. Also update runConfigure usage in build doc to reflect the latest changes.
